title: Biden Team Issues Outrageous Statement To Get Ahead Of This (Ep 1815)
description:
In this episode, I address the ridiculous efforts by the Biden team to get ahead of the coming bad news. 

News Picks:


Ben Carson comments on the real threat from Monkeypox. 


Critical elements of leading Alzheimer’s study possibly fraudulent.


Country star John Rich bypasses woke labels, releases song on Truth Social and soars to Number One.

Virginia attorney general hits back at Google.


Biden is a wimp, but he acts like a tough guy.

Woke Baseball’s All-Star Game Draws Worst TV Audience Ever.

Arrests are down and liberals are puzzled as to why.
